sentences.sContent: When he was talking to a girl he could hardly speak, and when he did speak he talked gibberish.
sentences.sCn: 跟女孩讲话时，他几乎说不出来，好不容易说出来了，又都是些胡言乱语。

trans.tranCn: 乱语；快速而不清楚的言语
trans.tranOther: If you describe someone's words or ideas as gibberish, you mean that they do not make any sense
